reviews.text:
There was no shower in the room; no warning was given about this. Every now and then there is no water supply to one of the shower stalls, and the cleaning lady can just walk into the locker room. There is no partition between the shower and the locker room, the entrance seems to be from around the corner, but still.

Repair work is also constantly being carried out, workers go back and forth carrying all sorts of construction materials, laying down mats, or something else.
Why do you force me to scan the code again after the gym, if the app doesn’t update my workout time afterwards, it turns out that only you should know how much I train?
When we opened it was normal, but now it’s starting to go downhill - the standard business scheme - we open, give low prices and good quality, then we raise prices and neglect quality.

Pros: condition of the equipment, cool view from the window, convenient location

P.S. Also, some male coaches do not wash their hands when visiting the restroom.

NO WAY !
This is the worst possible client marketing! I have no complaints about the hall.
But it's terrible for customer motivation.
Management review the promotion for customers. I'm not against paying you money, but some subscriptions with automatic withdrawal of funds have some unclear conditions for what I'm paying for.
The phrase voluntarily forced your managers knocks the knee to the aizit of your hall.

In general, the hall is good. For this price, you definitely won't find anything like it. A good selection of exercise equipment, a good cardio zone, a neat changing room (the only negative about the changing room is the open shower room, please make a door there 😁 because, well, once again, it is too steep to walk into the shower).
But, please, do something with the hood, because in the evening, when there is an influx of people, it is absolutely impossible to train, it feels like I am in a parlI. It's scary to imagine what will happen in the summer.
I would also like to see you have another leg press machine 🙏🏻 there are always queues for it 3 generations ahead....

I've been going to the gym since it opened. The first time was good, until a million people bought a subscription. Sometimes I go to the gym, sometimes to group classes. Previously, there was a maximum of 15 people (this was the registration limit) for group sessions, but now the number of people has increased and 25 people can sign up for a small hall, where the mat needs to be placed on someone’s head. Accordingly, there is not enough inventory when fully loaded (almost always in the evening). But even this can be survived, unlike VENTILATION. She's gone. There is a supply and exhaust system, but it does not work. When you enter the hall from the street, the stench is terrible. In the evening there is a hellish stench and stuffiness.
In the group room, the windows were completely fogged up from the middle of the workout.
When contacting support, they report that they are trying to solve the problems of ventilation, the number of people and the lack of a normal amount of equipment, but judging by the reviews below, no one is trying to do anything, people are walking around and doing well.

Trainers in group top (Elena and Vladislav).
New simulators.
If the administration paid attention to requests, it would be a good hall.

I'll edit my review a month later.
In response to my review, the answer was that the ventilation was being addressed, and the equipment had been purchased. NO. Nobody decides or plans to do anything. No inventory has been added. In addition, trainers at group sessions are asked to write good reviews, because the gym’s objective rating was 2.8
If you pay attention, there are good reviews from girls from group groups who were asked to write them.

Well, overall it’s not bad, but there are some disadvantages that call into question a visit to this hall. I think it’s worth raising the salary of administrators so that they will sometimes greet visitors first. I read in the reviews - the issue with the hood seems to be already being resolved, since the smell was really so-so + stuffy. Recently I wanted to invite a friend and use the bonus that is in the application. It turns out it is not valid. Then what is it there for? The application is clearly crude - you sell franchises and invest in marketing - invest in the application, make it more comfortable for people, not for yourself, and people will reach out to you
